  = forall (rule :: Symbol).
    ( Typeable (Event (EraRule rule era))
    , Eq (Event (EraRule rule era))
    , ToExpr (Event (EraRule rule era))
    ) =>
    SomeSTSEvent (Event (EraRule rule era))
